item.description:
I can't be at this event, but I'm posting it for anyone who is interested.

PLEASE JOIN US AT THIS NEW VENUE, WHERE MEMBERS CAN MIX AND MINGLE AFTER WORK OVER DRINKS/AND OR DINNER ON ROCCA'S DELIGHTFUL PATIO (WEATHER PERMITTING - IF NOT, IN THE INSIDE BAR AREA). Great opportunity to meet and mingle with other members of this meet-up.

I have had drinks and dinner here several times and think you will enjoy it very much.

Hope to see you there.

Contact Marianne (hellomarianne@gmail.com) for more information.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Drinks on the patio at Rocca
